i < N; i++) {\n            long long hash_value = 0;\n            long long p_pow = 1;\n            for (int j = i; j < N; j++) {\n                auto [new_hash, new_pow] = compute_hash(nums[j], hash_value, p_pow);\n                hash_value = new_hash;\n                p_pow = new_pow;\n                hash[i][j] = hash_value;\n            }\n        }\n\n        int ans = 0;\n        for (int i = 1; i < N-1; i++) {\n            for (int j = i+1; j < N; j++) {\n                if ((j-i >= i && hash[0][i-1] == hash[i][2*i-1]) ||\n                    (N-j >= j-i && hash[i][j-1] == hash[j][i+2*(j-i)-1])) {\n                    ans++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-beautiful-splits-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":979}
